about_the_game:
NOTE: DLC content requires Homeworld 3 to play. Nearly all DLC content is usable only in the War Games mode.

Plunder and capture your way through War Games with the Kalan Raiders Fleet Pack. Take command of the Kalan Raiders for the first time across two new fleets for War Games. In addition to all of the Kalan Raider ships becoming playable for the first time, three all new ships join the fray, the Swarm Fighter, Mine Launcher Corvette, and Capture Frigate. All of the below is included in the DLC:

  • The Raider fleet - This fleet has extensively raided Hiigaran space, and can produce a mix of Hiigaran and Kalan ships.
  • The Capture fleet - This fleet specializes in capturing enemy units, and can produce a mix of Incarnate and Kalan vessels.
  • Kalan Raiders Emblem included in Fleet Painter for War Games & Skirmish.
  • 11 new War Games challenges achievable only by DLC owners.
  • 40 new Artifacts unique to the Kalan Raiders fleets.

NOTE: DLC content requires Homeworld 3 to play. Nearly all DLC content is usable only in the War Games mode.

Plunder and capture your way through War Games with the Kalan Raiders Fleet Pack. Take command of the Kalan Raiders for the first time across two new fleets for War Games. In addition to all of the Kalan Raider ships becoming playable for the first time, three all new ships join the fray, the Swarm Fighter, Mine Launcher Corvette, and Capture Frigate. All of the below is included in the DLC:

  • The Raider fleet - This fleet has extensively raided Hiigaran space, and can produce a mix of Hiigaran and Kalan ships.
  • The Capture fleet - This fleet specializes in capturing enemy units, and can produce a mix of Incarnate and Kalan vessels.
  • Kalan Raiders Emblem included in Fleet Painter for War Games & Skirmish.
  • 11 new War Games challenges achievable only by DLC owners.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit/Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600/AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060/AMD RX 480/Intel ARC A380
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit/Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-9600K/AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 TI/AMD RX5700/Intel ARC A580
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
